website_summaries.verdict: This mixer has all the great Hamilton Beach features and comes with beaters designed for use with non-stick pots.
pros: Soft coating on the beaters help protect your bowls from scratches
Also includes dough hooks and whisk
A lot of power for the price
Includes snap-on storage container to keep your attachments handy and save space in the utensil drawer
cons: This hand mixer has six speeds, but still tends to be too fast to mix without splattering in shallow bowls

customer_reviews.title: Mistake
customer_reviews.text: I should have believed the negative reviews. The lower speeds are too high and cause lots of splattering outside the bowlor pot. We cooked some small red potatoes (whole) to make whipped potatoes. The beaters could not grab onto the potatoes but skimmed over them splatting small chips of potatoes all around. The beaters just couldn’t dig into the soft potatoes. Maybe the silicone made the beaters too slippery(?). In any case, in the future I will buy items like this locally where returns are easy.
customer_reviews.author: POCO

customer_reviews.title: Splatters all over the counter and all over you
customer_reviews.text: This mixer is absolutely horrible!!! I bought it to replace a similar mixer with a similar case that I use for 10 or 12 years. This mixer splatters everywhere and the case will not Snap-on to the mixer making it worthless. Don't waste your money and look elsewhere! I will be returning mine after having it for 10 minutes! I'll be replacing it with a mixer from a local box store so if it doesn't work, I don't have to pay to mail it back!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Eberline

customer_reviews.title: Low speeds didn't work
customer_reviews.text: When we received the mixer it wouldn't work on the lower speeds. I disassembled it and found a wire from the switch to the motor was loose. I soldered it back on and now the lower speeds work. ALSO, when I disassembled it I found that the cooling fan pulls what your mixing into the mixer from the front. It hadn't been used much but it was covered inside with what we'd been mixing. If the fan was reversed it would pull air in from the back of the mixer where it's not close to what you're mixing and blow it out the front keeping the insides clean. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: I like it because i can use it in my "non ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th one I've purchased...one for each of our two rentals, and one for our primary home and second home too! I like it because i can use it in my "non stick pots"....love the "soft" beaters.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great little appliance
customer_reviews.text: I like the performance of this mixer. It’s very compact and storage of attachments I’d very handy. You don’t have to hunt them down. I like having multiple beaters to suit the task. Sometimes you need 2 pair of beaters and this mixer has that, in Addition to whisk and dough beaters. Great value as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Why don't more manufacturers make coated beaters? They are a pleasure to use, and the mixer has good power. Very happy. Just wish it was pink, but that's another story.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well but low speed is not low.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good mixer for mashed potatoes and cake mixes but make sure you have a high walled bowl. Low speed on this is pretty quick and for cake mixes I use the whisk attachment to avoid splash. Whole thing with attachments and cord stows away nicely with the provided snap on container, keeping it all in one place and making life a touch easier instead of digging through "the miscellaneous" kitchen drawer. I can see why they would give you dough hooks. It can handle dough I'm sure although I've never tried.
customer_reviews.author: Ed the Fred

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Product produced by Hamilton Beach
customer_reviews.text: The beaters do not stay in. Purchased in June of this year this hand mixer used infrequently but during that time the beater would drop out when the mixer was upright. Sometimes one but most of the time both. The storage case setup for the mixer & utensils is a great idea.--- Just a bad mixer... Save your money when considering Hamilton Beach blenders.
customer_reviews.author: Al M

customer_reviews.title: A Real Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: This mixer has lots of power for the price. I bought this one for a relative who fell in love with mine.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Nice mixer with plenty of extras.
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a gift, but my daughter really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rasberry

customer_reviews.title: All that I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I enjoy cooking sweets, so this blender is the best for that and helps me mix everything. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: love this mixer i have had one for 4 yrs this one is a gift for my daughter it is very strong and works great
customer_reviews.author: dorothy duve

customer_reviews.title: i love this mixer
customer_reviews.text: i love this mixer, this is the second one i;ve purchased, i gave the first one to my daughter and knew i needed one for myself. it is lightweight and easy to handle but has a heavy duty motor so you have all the power required for a heavy batter. its never failed me. i would buy it again and gift this mixer again! excellent value and quality..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Used it about 5 times in a month. Great for storage
customer_reviews.author: K. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Beaters way too big
customer_reviews.text: Do not like this mixer. The beaters are too far apart and too big and does not cream things good at all. Can't mix in small bowl for it slings food off the beaters. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanelle Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Great mixer
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything it described!! Couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2boys

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mixer because of the coated blades! I can use them in my pots and pans and don't have to worry about scratching them! This is my 2nd one!
customer_reviews.author: jcgrandma

customer_reviews.title: good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: In general, I like this mixer and it is a good value for the money. As others have mentioned, the low speed is not very low. It's better to stir your mix by spoon a bit before turning on the mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine E. Barber

customer_reviews.title: Silicone?
customer_reviews.text: I contacted Hamilton Beech to see if the soft scrape beaters are rated for high temps. After getting the run around, they couldn’t help me. I need this mixer to make a cake with boiling batter and frosting.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Day

customer_reviews.title: Too Fast
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to other reviewers....There is NO LOW on this mixer, it may say it on the mixer dial but it is not low when it operates. What a mess, it throws everything out of the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Great product/price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hand mixer! Great price and product! I love the range of speed, fast is really fast. Makes whipping potatoes a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lonie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend buying.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the price I love it and arrived early in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great! So glad I ordered it
customer_reviews.text: It works great! So glad I ordered it. My hand mixer stopped working on me! My Grandparents gave it to me when we got married. That was almost 51 years ago! Speaks well for A Hamilton Beach!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE MY MIXER IT SO CONVIENCE AND LOVE ALL THE DIFFERENT PARTS THAT G0 WITH IT;
customer_reviews.author: bertha pate

customer_reviews.title: Nice blades
customer_reviews.text: Lowest speed is not very low, throws flour out of bowl.
customer_reviews.author: rick k

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I’ve had mine for years. Ordered this one from my mother in law who loves the rubber mixing attachments. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Built for a man
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy to hold for very long! Spend a little more and get a lighter one.
customer_reviews.author: carol a. guthrie

customer_reviews.title: best mixer ever
customer_reviews.text: Incredible mixer. Bought this to replace the same that lasted decades.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Good mixer. Only problem I have is trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good mixer. Only problem I have is trying to get it to snap back onto the plastic holder it comes with. Other than that I haven’t had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Candace D.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this, you have to know how to use what tool. The singular wire whisk is what to use for whipping cream, there's no splatter. This product solved my dilemma that the large, expensive mixers aren't made well anymore. You have to readjust them each use and there are other problems. Told my mom and sister in law to never give up their old ones which still work. This is a wonderful solution and little helper.
customer_reviews.author: NewAtAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This mixer was a gift to my daughter when she moved into her first apartment. The storage case comes in handy
customer_reviews.author: B. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Great hand mixer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mixer! The case holds all the extra parts so that's super nice! And the non stick blenders are awesome! The only con is that the lowest speed is pretty fast and can fling stuff all over if your not careful. Over all a great hand mixer! I bought one for me, a friend and my mom:)
customer_reviews.author: Madie Russo

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service. Product had some dust on it, everything else was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent!
customer_reviews.text: very handy and with the convenience of the storage box that comes with it. the scrape free device works real well. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: PanchoVilla

customer_reviews.title: 6 speed only works after 4th speed
customer_reviews.text: It is a 6 speed. It only works after you turn it to speed number 4. And too much drama to send back since I threw the package away before using it a week later. Never again
customer_reviews.author: Mary N.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful mixer!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful mixer! Love the storage compartment underneath. It is not meant for small mixing jobs though. It will definitely make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: ficklebrit

customer_reviews.title: Great mixer for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a hand mixer. I have a stand mixer that is of very high quality, it is heavy and a lot of times too large for the job. When Amazon offered me this at such a great price I could not turn it down. Love the storage container that comes with it too!
customer_reviews.author: Luvtoshop

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: This mixer is great! It doesn't scrape up my bowls like my other mixers have! I also like the storage case it comes with because everything can be kept and stored together easily.
customer_reviews.author: amanda wagner

customer_reviews.title: Nice hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mixer for myself a few months back happy that it stored my beaters and cord. I end up buying it for my mother in law for Christmas. My only real complete is the low speed isn't very slow but over all it really does and great job when I don't feel like dragging out my full size mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Colo mom

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom as a Mother's Day gift since her hand mixer had just broken just a few days before. She has a stand up KitchenAid mixer that she uses for heavy duty jobs but she also likes the hand mixer for smaller jobs. She enjoyed this one a lot and especially liked the soft scrape beaters.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it comes with a case that all the equipment can fit inside. I need to use it more to be able to have a more clear image.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Kyriakidou

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: does what a blender should do beautifully ! need i say more! :) great deal for the price- happy I have it in my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved it until it broke less than a month after I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Lentz

customer_reviews.title: So far, so great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a dang good mixer. I shopped around for a mixer for months maybe close to a year. I really only needed new beaters for my last mixer but those were more expensive than buying a new one. I really liked the softscrape beaters as an option. I make mashed potatoes and mushy food for my kids and that is dope. It also comes with standard beaters so you are all covered. The slow speed is not too shabby. The highest could honestly be higher. The snap case is nice. No more looking through my utensil drawer for my accessories. Overall a great, great mixer. Way better than my old black and Decker.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY

customer_reviews.title: ... have elbow problems so stirring has been a little painful, this did the job and seems to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in my sauce pan to make fudge (so it wouldn't scratch my pan) I have elbow problems so stirring has been a little painful, this did the job and seems to be made well, however the lowest speed is still fairly high! Plus I'm not super pleased with the storage container that goes with it, stuffing the blades to the mixer and the cord all in one area is a pain!
customer_reviews.author: CLB

customer_reviews.title: Very splashy and not in a good way
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot, with 2 exceptions that are related: one is that the lowest speed is too fast, and the other is that the coated beaters splash like crazy. Between the two of them, I end up with a huge sticky mess except when beating thick, heavy batters. It's great for creaming butter, but not good for cake mixes. I'm going to try to find uncoated beaters to see if that helps. Pluses - the little case that holds the cord and the attachments and that the mixer nests on when not in use is very clever and really useful (no clawing through a junk drawer to find attachments). And it's got a lot of power.
customer_reviews.author: Web Webster

customer_reviews.title: MESSY!
customer_reviews.text: Beaters are too tall, and won't fully submerge in a large size bowl unless the bowl is almost full! Slings stuff EVERYWHERE when trying to mix! Even put in the sink to try and avoid a mess, but it still got e everything all dirty! The power is insane! The low setting is as powerful as my old mixer when it was on high... not suitable for my needs at all. I'm not a fan of this messy mixer
customer_reviews.author: Truth speaker

customer_reviews.title: The speeds are to fast
customer_reviews.text: What made me purchase this mixer is the rubber feet. But I noticed that it did not mix my mashed potatoes very well at all. They were still lumpy. Also I did agree with other reviews that the speeds on this mixer is extremely high. Even on the lowest setting, the potatoes were flying everywhere. So I am disappointed with the purchase. I'm glad that I still kept my other mixer.
customer_reviews.author: A. R.

customer_reviews.title: Top notch!
customer_reviews.text: This mixer is the cadillac of hand mixers. One of the features I just love is the coated beaters! If you use stainless or any other type of metallic mixing bowls, it removes a LOT of noise from the equation. My other favorite feature that stands out is the clip-on case/base that attaches to the bottom of the mixer when not in use, although it takes a bit of work to fit all the attachments AND the cord inside of it. I would buy this again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Uruviel Ancalímon

customer_reviews.title: Whipped potato heaven!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these as gifts for my daughers. They said they're fantastic! The silicone beaters, keeps it from scratching their non stick cookware. No need to mess up a bowl. Great to store all the attachments in one place too!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikolee'

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable fit to my hand.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Perfectly fits my hand grip. The snap-on tool holder keeps everything together in one space. The scrapers work better than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mixer
customer_reviews.text: Has good quality for the money. Works well with all accessories. Like the fact it has storage all built in one.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Compact Hand Mixer
customer_reviews.text: I love this mixer.........it's powerful and compact with all the attachments I will ever need in a hand mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Fully-Functional and Rifle-Ready
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Lot of power. Gives foods to be mixed a good "beat-down".
customer_reviews.author: The Oracle

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough for heavy cookie dough
customer_reviews.text: Held up very well to fruit filled oatmeal cookies! Pleased and will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LeeJo

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a similar one that was 10 years old. Used it a few times and it works great for my light cooking needs.
customer_reviews.author: Puppy lover

customer_reviews.title: Great mixer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Quality beaters and silicone seems high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cronin

customer_reviews.title: Love this new one
customer_reviews.text: My old Hamilton beach from 20 plus plus years finally wore out. Love this new one , works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: cyndi

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: my sister was in need of a mixer, and a friends had recently received one as a house warming. looked for same one because she had liked hers, found same mixer with slightly different mixing attachments included and gave to sister. currently no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one. Other one lasted 4 years with normal to heavy use. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: not that great
customer_reviews.text: says has a slow speed but it does not at all
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Cancel

customer_reviews.title: Mixer
customer_reviews.text: I do not do a great deal of baking, so the dough hook will probably never be used. I like the soft scrape beaters;they do a wonderful job on cake batter and whipped potatoes. The other set of beaters is not useful for jobs such as the removal of strings from sweet potatoes. It was necessary to buy another mixer with wide blades to do this job.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey H. Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: love the fact that everything fits in the bottom so ...
customer_reviews.text: love the fact that everything fits in the bottom so you dont lose parts. i love the rubber ends on the mixer blades so they dont make a lot of noise. my only issue is that even on the lowest setting, i sling food everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait untill I had used the mixer before writing review; I have used it now several times and am very impressed by the power of it. ....Huge improvement over my old one.. it was about 20 years old though. The only thing that I don't particularly like it the placement of the power cord. I have not discovered a way to store the mixer without the cord protruding from the side. I am concerned about breakage of internal wires, but performance exceeds expection.
customer_reviews.author: curtp

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: love this mixer,love the wrapped beaters.price is right with this mixer.
customer_reviews.author: linda palmer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came with beaters that were not coated.
customer_reviews.author: Angelyn Baumgartner

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 6-Speed Hand Mixer with storage Case and Soft Srape
product_meta.description: Hamilton Beach, 290W, 6 speed, Hand mixer, Black with stainless accent, with new innovative soft scrape utensils, including beaters & whisk scrape the bowl for thorough mixing, new generation snap on case makes it easier to store clean tools after mixer has put away, 6 speeds with QuickBurst, bowl rest, includes metal dough hooks.
feature_bullets: SoftScrape beaters won't scratch bowls or nonstick pots and are durable and dishwasher safe
Also includes metal whisk and dough hooks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars212 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
